entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High 20 except 12 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. 30 percent chance of showers inland late this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this afternoon. High 20 except 12 along parts of the coast. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Friday 12 May 2023
